purchase 17 self-contained breathing apparatuses, U.S. Barack Obama Kirsten Gillibrand announced today. The new breathing apparatuses will replace the fire company's 13-year-old air packs, and increase the overall safety of Mottville's 35 volunteer firefighters. It's going to help keep all the firefighters safe so they can enter burning buildings with the latest technology in air packs, Mottville volunteer Fire Chief Tim Baker said. The release details were announced yesterday by Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer . This launch marks the first time that a product has been provided as an online service before its conventional release, an act that, Steve Ballmer says, really reflects the push by Microsoft into the cloud. Microsoft previously focused primarily on the on-premises version of Dynamics CRM, putting the company at odds with major competitors such as Salesforce.com's CRM suite.
